original: @325b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @325b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: pra ni dh'a na ratna r'a dza n'a ma //
analyzed: pra ni dh'a na ratna r'a dza n'a ma //
translated: Pranidhanaratnaraja-nama

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: smon lam rin po che'i rgyal po zhes bya ba /
analyzed: smon lam rin po che'i rgyal po zhes bya ba /
translated: The King of Precious Aspiration

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas!

original: ji srid du ni dus gsum gyi //
analyzed: ji srid du ni dus gsum gyi //
translated: For as long as the three times

original: sems can thams cad ma zad pa //
analyzed: sems can thams cad ma zad pa //
translated: Are not exhausted for all sentient beings,

original: de srid sangs rgyas zhing rnams ni //
analyzed: de srid sangs rgyas zhing rnams ni //
translated: For that long, the Buddha-fields

original: rdul gyis byur bur gang ba yi //🔽rdul rnams re re dag la yang //
analyzed: rdul gyis byur bur gang ba yi // rdul rnams re re dag la yang //
translated: Will be filled with dust.🔽For each of those dust particles,

original: de yi rdul mtshungs zhing gnas pa'i //
analyzed: de yi rdul mtshungs zhing gnas pa'i //
translated: There will be fields equal to the number of dust particles,

original: zhing dang zhing gi sangs rgyas la //🔽rdul de'i grangs kyis @326a * //
analyzed: zhing dang zhing gi sangs rgyas la // rdul de'i grangs kyis @326a * //
translated: And in each of those fields, there will be Buddhas.

original: lus rnams kyi //🔽de rdul snyed du phyag byas nas //
analyzed: lus rnams kyi // de rdul snyed du phyag byas nas //
translated: With as many bodies as there are dust particles,🔽I will bow down to them all

original: gzhan yang rgyal rnams bstod bgyid cing //
analyzed: gzhan yang rgyal rnams bstod bgyid cing //
translated: And praise the Victorious Ones.

original: rdul de dang mnyam bskal pa ru //
analyzed: rdul de dang mnyam bskal pa ru //
translated: For as many eons as there are dust particles,🔽I will remain in solitude and make offerings to them.

original: gnas de rtse gcig rtag mchod shog / sras bcas sangs rgyas chos la phyag bgyi zhing //
analyzed: gnas de rtse gcig rtag mchod shog / sras bcas sangs rgyas chos la phyag bgyi zhing //
translated: I pay homage to the Buddhas and their teachings.

original: de dag rnams la rtag par skyabs su mchi //
analyzed: de dag rnams la rtag par skyabs su mchi //
translated: I constantly go for refuge to them.

original: lus dang yongs su bzung med me tog dang // rin chen de rnams la yang rtag tu dbul //
analyzed: lus dang yongs su bzung med me tog dang // rin chen de rnams la yang rtag tu dbul //
translated: I constantly offer to them my body, my possessions, and all my flowers, jewels, and so on.

original: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags bgyi zhing //🔽kun nas sdig dang rnam par bral bar bgyi //
analyzed: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags bgyi zhing // kun nas sdig dang rnam par bral bar bgyi //
translated: I confess each and every one of my misdeeds.🔽I rejoice in all that is virtuous.

original: bsod nams kun la yi rang bdag gis ni //
analyzed: bsod nams kun la yi rang bdag gis ni //
translated: I rejoice in all the virtue of all beings.

original: dge bas 'gro kun mchog gi byang chub gyur //
analyzed: dge bas 'gro kun mchog gi byang chub gyur //
translated: May all beings attain the highest enlightenment.

original: khyad 'phags dam chos rab ston dus kun du //
analyzed: khyad 'phags dam chos rab ston dus kun du //
translated: May the holy Dharma of the Victorious Ones be taught and spread at all times.

original: rdzogs sangs rgyas bzhugs dam bca' 'bras bcas gyur //
analyzed: rdzogs sangs rgyas bzhugs dam bca' 'bras bcas gyur //
translated: May the perfect Buddhas remain and live for uncountable ages.

original: rgyal ba rnams la rtag tu mchod bgyi zhing //
analyzed: rgyal ba rnams la rtag tu mchod bgyi zhing //
translated: I constantly make offerings to the Victorious Ones.

original: 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas rgyas nyid gyur cig / phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthas klas pa'i //
analyzed: 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas rgyas nyid gyur cig / phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthas klas pa'i //
translated: May I attain the state of Buddhahood for the benefit of all beings.

original: sems can kun gyi don sgrub ched //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi don sgrub ched //
translated: In order to benefit all beings,

original: ji ltar 'jam dpal spyad spyod pa //
analyzed: ji ltar 'jam dpal spyad spyod pa //
translated: I will practice just as Manjushri has.

original: bdag spyod de dang 'dra gyur cig / shes rab zab mo nyid du gyur bas bdag /'jam dpal dang ni mtshungs gyur mtha' yas pa'i //
analyzed: bdag spyod de dang 'dra gyur cig / shes rab zab mo nyid du gyur bas bdag /'jam dpal dang ni mtshungs gyur mtha' yas pa'i //
translated: And by becoming compassion, may I be like Avalokita.

original: 'gro la nyam thag zhi byed brtse ba yi //🔽ngang tshul 'jig rten dbang phyug 'dra bar shog / kun du bzang pos 'gro ba rnams kyi yid //
analyzed: 'gro la nyam thag zhi byed brtse ba yi // ngang tshul 'jig rten dbang phyug 'dra bar shog / kun du bzang pos 'gro ba rnams kyi yid //
translated: By becoming the means of pacifying the distress of infinite beings,🔽May I be like the nature of the Lord of the World.🔽By becoming the means of delighting the minds of all beings,

original: dga' byed kun du bzang po dang 'dra zhing //
analyzed: dga' byed kun du bzang po dang 'dra zhing //
translated: May I be like Samantabhadra.

original: byams pa legs par 'phel las blo gros ni //
analyzed: byams pa legs par 'phel las blo gros ni //
translated: By becoming the means of increasing love,🔽May I be like Maitreya.

original: byams pa ji bzhin nyid du 'gyur bar shog / sbyin pas nam mkha'i mdzod dang tshul khrims kyis //🔽rnam 'phrul blo gros mtshan te bzod pa dang // gus par sbyor bas brtson pa'i brtson 'grus kyis //
analyzed: byams pa ji bzhin nyid du 'gyur bar shog / sbyin pas nam mkha'i mdzod dang tshul khrims kyis // rnam 'phrul blo gros mtshan te bzod pa dang // gus par sbyor bas brtson pa'i brtson 'grus kyis //
translated: By becoming the means of increasing generosity, may I be like the sky treasury;🔽By becoming the means of increasing discipline, may I be like the one with the mark of wisdom;🔽By becoming the means of increasing patience, may I be like the noble one with the patience of being tormented;🔽By becoming the means of increasing diligence, may I be like the one with the diligence of being tormented.

original: gdung bas 'phags pa'i brtson 'grus bzhin gyur cig / bsam gtan gyis ni rnam par 'gyur ba dang // bral ba'i blo gros sring mo stobs dag gis //
analyzed: gdung bas 'phags pa'i brtson 'grus bzhin gyur cig / bsam gtan gyis ni rnam par 'gyur ba dang // bral ba'i blo gros sring mo stobs dag gis //
translated: By becoming the means of increasing concentration, may I be like the one with the mind free from distraction;🔽By becoming the means of increasing wisdom, may I be like the one with the wisdom of the noble ones.

original: lag na rdo rje dang mtshungs sh'akya thub //
analyzed: lag na rdo rje dang mtshungs sh'akya thub //
translated: Like Vajrapāṇi, like Śākyamuni,🔽May I be known as a teacher, like Vajragarbha.

original: ston par shes pa rdor snying 'dra bar shog / bde bar gshegs pa yongs su dri ba ni //
analyzed: ston par shes pa rdor snying 'dra bar shog / bde bar gshegs pa yongs su dri ba ni //
translated: In asking the Sugata questions,

original: sgrib pa rnam par sel ba bzhin gyur te //
analyzed: sgrib pa rnam par sel ba bzhin gyur te //
translated: May I be like Avalokiteśvara,

original: lhag pa'i bsam pa phun tshogs brtan pa'i blo //
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pa phun tshogs brtan pa'i blo //
translated: With a firm mind, perfect in higher intention,🔽Always like Sthiramati.🔽With miraculous powers, like Anikṣipta-m-āyūha,

original: rtag tu @326b brtan pa'i blo gros lta bur shog / rdzu 'phrul yang ni gzhan du mi 'gro dang // thabs la mkhas pa dri med grags dang mtshungs //
analyzed: rtag tu @326b brtan pa'i blo gros lta bur shog / rdzu 'phrul yang ni gzhan du mi 'gro dang // thabs la mkhas pa dri med grags dang mtshungs //
translated: Skilled in means, like Vimalakīrti,

original: sems can rnams la sman dge shin tu dga' //🔽rtag par shin tu dga' ba ltar gyur cig / pha rol phyin sogs rab tu 'byed pa la //
analyzed: sems can rnams la sman dge shin tu dga' // rtag par shin tu dga' ba ltar gyur cig / pha rol phyin sogs rab tu 'byed pa la //
translated: Delighting in the welfare and happiness of beings,🔽Always like Nanda.🔽In the analysis of the perfections and so on,

original: blo gros mi zad pa dang mtshungs gyur cing //
analyzed: blo gros mi zad pa dang mtshungs gyur cing //
translated: May I be like Akṣayamati,

original: dpag med phun tshogs dbyangs kyis nges ston pa //
analyzed: dpag med phun tshogs dbyangs kyis nges ston pa //
translated: Teaching with a voice endowed with infinite qualities,🔽Like the wise one, Saṃghabhadra.

original: rgyu dang mi rgyu'i blo ldan ji bzhin shog / rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa la //
analyzed: rgyu dang mi rgyu'i blo ldan ji bzhin shog / rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa la //
translated: Always relying on spiritual friends,

original: skyon med yid ni nor bzangs lta bu dang // dpe med nam mkha'i chos rnams nyer ston pa//
analyzed: skyon med yid ni nor bzangs lta bu dang // dpe med nam mkha'i chos rnams nyer ston pa//
translated: And like Akashagarbha, revealing the sky-like Dharma.

original: nam mkha'i snying po lta bur bdag gyur cig / sa bzhin 'gro ba'i nyer 'tshor gyur pa las //
analyzed: nam mkha'i snying po lta bur bdag gyur cig / sa bzhin 'gro ba'i nyer 'tshor gyur pa las //
translated: May I be like Kshitigarbha, the earth that supports all beings,🔽And like Jambhala, always bringing relief to the poor.

original: 'gro la mnyam par phan byed sa snying dang // slong ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal zhi la bdag / rtag tu dzambha la dang 'dra bar shog / rin chen chos ston pa yis mi ngal ba //🔽bdag ni chos 'phags lta bur 'gyur ba dang // shes rab pha rol phyin pa tshol ba la //
analyzed: 'gro la mnyam par phan byed sa snying dang // slong ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal zhi la bdag / rtag tu dzambha la dang 'dra bar shog / rin chen chos ston pa yis mi ngal ba // bdag ni chos 'phags lta bur 'gyur ba dang // shes rab pha rol phyin pa tshol ba la //
translated: May I be like Dharmodgata, never tiring of teaching the precious Dharma,🔽And like Sadaprarudita, always seeking the perfection of wisdom.

original: byang sems rtag tu du dang mtshungs par shog / gzhan yang yongs su bsngo ba bdun dag la //
analyzed: byang sems rtag tu du dang mtshungs par shog / gzhan yang yongs su bsngo ba bdun dag la //
translated: May I be like the bodhisattvas, always seeking the Dharma,🔽And like the wise one Vajradhvaja,

original: mkhas pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan lta bu dang // ma lus bdun rnams yongs su rdzogs pa las //
analyzed: mkhas pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan lta bu dang // ma lus bdun rnams yongs su rdzogs pa las //
translated: May I be like Samantabhadra, who has perfected all the perfections,🔽And like the Victorious One, who is always far-reaching.

original: rtag par ring ba rgyal ba bzhin gyur cig / de ltar lhag pa'i bsam pas yon tan tshogs //
analyzed: rtag par ring ba rgyal ba bzhin gyur cig / de ltar lhag pa'i bsam pas yon tan tshogs //
translated: In this way, with an altruistic attitude, I dedicate the accumulation of virtues

original: skyon med grags pa de dang de las ni //
analyzed: skyon med grags pa de dang de las ni //
translated: And from that, the Victorious Ones and their heirs🔽are delighted, and all beings are always peaceful.

original: sras bcas rgyal rnams rab tu dgyes pa dang // 'gro ba thams cad rtag tu zhi gyur cig / rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i yon tan rnams //
analyzed: sras bcas rgyal rnams rab tu dgyes pa dang // 'gro ba thams cad rtag tu zhi gyur cig / rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i yon tan rnams //
translated: The qualities of the Victorious Ones and their heirs

original: mngon par 'dod las yang dag dge thob pa //
analyzed: mngon par 'dod las yang dag dge thob pa //
translated: are obtained from the perfect virtue of what is desired.

original: shin tu 'phel ba de yis mtha' yas pa'i //
analyzed: shin tu 'phel ba de yis mtha' yas pa'i //
translated: By that, may the infinite

original: 'gro rnams yon tan tshogs des rab gnas shog / smon lam rin po che'i rgyal po zhes bya ba /
analyzed: 'gro rnams yon tan tshogs des rab gnas shog / smon lam rin po che'i rgyal po zhes bya ba /
translated: beings be well-established in the accumulation of those qualities.

original: slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The King of Precious Aspiration, composed by the great master Nagarjuna, is complete.🔽By the great eastern Indian pandit, the elder Vanaratna, and the

original: // / rgya gar shar phyogs kyi sadna ga ra'i pandi ta chen po gnas brtan nags kyi rin chen gyi zhal snga nas dang / dge slong chos smra ba bsod nams rgya mtsho'i sdes /
analyzed: // / rgya gar shar phyogs kyi sadna ga ra'i pandi ta chen po gnas brtan nags kyi rin chen gyi zhal snga nas dang / dge slong chos smra ba bsod nams rgya mtsho'i sdes /
translated: monk and dharma teacher Sonam Gyatso,

original: dpal bsam yas lhun grub rtse'i pho brang du bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: dpal bsam yas lhun grub rtse'i pho brang du bsgyur ba'o//
translated: it was translated at the glorious Lhundrup Palace of Samye.
